head.title: Farm HOLY - Stake yCRV tokens
head.description: HOLY - Earn HOLY tokens by staking HOLY-ETH LP, yCRV or other DeFi Uniswap V2 LP Tokens.

body.name: yCRV
body.title: Stake yCRV
body.description: Deposit your yCRV tokens to earn HOLY.
body.detailedDescription: Deposit your yCRV tokens to earn HOLY. ðŸŒŸ Please note, that HolyKnight stakes yCRV into yCurve vault by Yearn Finance to accrue yield. yCurve Vault has a withdrawal fee of 0.5%, that can be applied in some cases. This is Yearn Finance fee, and is not controlled or taken by HolyKnight. More information can be found here.
